item.title: Social Endeavours
item.description:
Descriptive Research: Climatic Cycle and Weather Regime

Introduction

Led a group of 4 individuals to conduct a research and field based project on the topic of “Climatic Cycle and Weather Regime- Needs and Aspirations of Future Generations”. Won the 2nd Prize at regional level in NCSC organized competition.

Duration: August 2015 to September 2015

Details

  • Spread awareness on harms of E-Waste in schools and nearby localities through street plays, posters and public speeches
  • Collected data on E-Waste generation in the school through surveys
  • Visited ISRO Ahmedabad to gather information on their state-of-the-art recycling techniques
  • Contacted various NGOs to help in collection and proper disposal of E-Waste

Case Study: Intersectionality and Access

Introduction

Participated in a month long workshop on accessibility issues faced by different sections of society. Learnt about the implications of such issues and conducted a field project in Kheda district near Ahmedabad on the theme of Women Empowerment. Received “Outstanding Social Action Project” certificate from ITSA International.

Duration: August 2013 to September 2013

Details

  • Received a token grant from ITSA International
  • Distributed study material to underprivileged students and reviewed their state of education
  • Conducted bi-weekly classes on basic education for 4 weeks for students
